head.title: Document Merge and Split Solution | On Premise APIs & Free App
head.description: Merge & Split MS Office, OpenDocument, PDF images & other File Formats using On Premise Solution or use the Online Document Merger & Splitter App.

header.title: Solution to Merge and Split Documents
header.description: Easily merge multiple documents or split Microsoft Office, OpenOffice, PDF and other documents into pages.

net.content: On Premise APIs that can help you implement quick split and merge feature for multiple documents in your .NET based applications.

java.content: Native Java APIs to quickly merge multiple documents or split any document into pages within your Java based applications.

curl.content: Simple cURL commands for RESTful document merger Cloud API to merge and split documents across the wide range of supported popular document formats.

net.content: Cloud SDK for Microsoft .NET that help programmers to implement quick merge and split feature for multiple documents with in their .NET based applications.

java.content: Combine multiple documents into one, split any document to multiple, reorder, replace or change page orientation in your Java applications.

total.content: Try our free online app to concatenate more than 30 types of files without leaving your favorite web browser.

docx.content: Concatenate multiple DOCX files to generate a single document.

pdf.content: Merge multiple PDF files to generate a single document directly from the web browser.
